thread.title: Holly Willoughby suffers BRITs wardrobe nightmare as she spends night trying to avoid partygoer who wore the same dress at Warner Music afterparty
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby suffers BRITs wardrobe nightmare as she spends night trying to avoid partygoer who wore the same dress at Warner Music afterparty

author: Nola Ojomu
title: Holly Willoughby suffers BRITs wardrobe nightmare as she spends night trying to avoid partygoer who wore the same dress at Warner Music afterparty
text:
TV Magazine SEEING DOUBLE Holly Willoughby suffers BRITs wardrobe nightmare as she spends night trying to avoid partygoer who wore the same dress at Warner Music afterparty 
The This Morning presenter's standout look wasn't as unique as she would have hoped Exclusive BY NOLA OJOMU, SHOWBIZ REPORTER AND LAUREN FRANKLIN, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 23rd February 2017, 12:26 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments HOLLY Willoughby found herself suffering a wardrobe nightmare at the Warner Music and Ciroc BRIT awards afterparty as she turned up in the same outfit as another partygoer. 
The popular TV presenter looked stunning in the silver sequinned dress which she had worn to present an award at the prestigious ceremony earlier in the night. Getty Images 5 Holly Willoughby found herself suffering a wardrobe nightmare at a BRIT awards afterparty 
It’s every star’s nightmare to turn up to the biggest event of the year in the same outfit as someone else and Holly feel victim to the moment when she bumped into another woman who also opted for a shimmering silver dress for the bash. 
The mother-of-three chose to brush the incident off and continue dancing the night away with her famous pals. 
However the ladies went on to keep their distance from each other as they partied with separate groups at the star-studded bash held at the Freemason’s Hall in London. 
Holly was spotted partying with her friends Caroline Flack and Emma Bunton while she also hung out with Frank Lampard and Christine Bleakley. Holly turned up in the same outfit as another partygoer PA:Press Association The popular TV presenter looked stunning in the silver sequinned dress which she had worn to present an award at the prestigious ceremony Wenn Holly was probably hoping to stand out from the crowd with her striking dress RELATED ARTICLES JUST JADE Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall hit the headlines for flashing her knickers at the BRITs - here's what we know about her BLOOMING LOVELY Pregnant Cheryl seen in never before seen pictures proudly showing off her baby bump behind the scenes of her announcement THE MORNING AFTER Rita Ora, Holly Willoughby and Fearne Cotton share snaps as they beat their BRIT hangovers DIRTY STOP OUT Janet Street-Porter jokingly calls Stacy Solomon a 's**t' for wearing her BRIT Awards outfit and make-up to Loose Women 'THE BOYS WERE LET DOWN' Danielle Lloyd blasts ex Jamie O'Hara and claims he left their sons 'upset' amid custody row TOP OF THE POTS The Great Pottery Throw Down is on tonight! Here's all you need to know You're incredible! Louis Tomlinson thanks One Direction fans for BRIT in heartfelt message INSTA LOVE Jeremy McConnell likes Stephanie Davis' lingerie photo just hours after they spark reconciliation rumours 'I THOUGHT I WAS HAVING A HEART ATTACK' Ricky Gervais forced to leave stage over heart attack scare STILL CLOSE? Amber Turner and Dan Edgar pictured filming together after enjoying a secret fling in Tenerife DAN'S STALKING HELL Danniella Westbrook claims she blocked 43 accounts made by the SAME person harassing her MURDER MOST HORRID Murdered By My Fiance is on tonight and tells the tragic tale of Helen Bailey and her killer Ian Stewart 
Holly chose natural make-up aside from lashings of black mascara which hid any hint of tiredness. 
Yet just a few hours later she looked effortlessly glam as she posed for her daily outfit Instagram snap in a flirty black printed dress by designer Ted Baker. 
The mum-of-three flashed a flirty smile and turned her head to one side as she posed in her printed shift dress in a picture. Instagram Holly partied with pal Emma Bunton at the swanky BRITS Bash Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield descend into giggles on This Morning A post shared by Holly Willoughby (@hollywilloughby) on Feb 23, 2017 at 1:45am PST 

She wrote: "The morning after the night before ... today's look on @thismorning." 
One of her followers kindly commented: "Looking good from the Brits to this morning... good turnaround."
